Name: SmartField
Description: SmartField Kit allows you to track agricurtural data in IOT Shop Dashboard using Click&Deploy MCU with humidity, pressure, temperature, as well as soil moisture.

Name: AgroChip
Description: AgroChip allows you to track agricurtural data in IOT Shop Dashboard using npdrumsMCU with humidity, pressure, temperature, as well as soil moisture.

Name: Garden Watch
Description: GardenWatch allows you to track agricurtural data in IOT Shop Dashboard using npdrumsMCU with humidity, pressure, temperature, as well as soil moisture.

Name: Secure Home
Description: SecureHome kit allows you to track data from your dashboard using cranberryMCU with motion and vibration sensors.

Name: Safe Perimeter
Description: Safe Perimeter gives you capabilities to track data from IOT Shop Dashboard using our micro controller with perimeter (IR, PIR) sensors integrated with alarm system.

Name: GeoLoc
Description: Ideal for finding and keeping track of your belongings. Equiped with GPS, gyro and accel sensors.

Name: Env Control
Description: Check and regulate humidity and temperature, as well as presence of dangerous gases inside of buildings, with our MCU with sensors.

Name: Radiation and Gases Alarm
Description: Alarm system that tracks radiation levels, as well as presence of harmful gases in rooms of your choice.

Name: Smart Light
Description: Light your way around the house and control color and intensity of light with our Smart Light kit, that comes with LED lightning and motion sensors.

Name: Socket Control
Description: Control your expences and track data with our smart sockets.
